name: 王柄雄
objective: This course aims to equip students with fundamental knowledge about structural analysis for beams, frames, and trusses. This semester will focus on analyses of statically determinate structures using energy and statically indeterminate structures using force and displacement methods.
schedule:
Week 1: Principle of Work, Energy
Week 2-4: Method of Virtual Work for Trusses, Beams, and Frames
Week 5: Statically Indeterminate Structures 
Week 6-7: Force Method and Compatibility of Displacements
Week 8: Maxwell's Theorem of Reciprocal Displacements
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Force Method for Composite and Symmetric Structures
Week 11-12: Influence Lines for Statically Indeterminate Structures
Week 13-15: Slope-deflection Method
Week 16-17: Moment-Distribution Method
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Attendance & Homework & Quiz: 20% 
Midterm: 40% 
Final Exam.: 40%
materials: R. C. Hibbeler (2020). Structural Analysis 10ed. ISBN: 978-1-292-24713-7(http://www.gaulih.com.tw/tier/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=VX0417&Category=0)
consultation: phwang@ntut.edu.tw 星期一 (Monday)　10:00 ~ 12:00 星期三 (wednesday)　10:00 ~ 12:00
